LanguageData.MSE_AdvancedRangedPlatformModule.label: advanced ranged platform module
LanguageData.MSE_AdvancedRangedPlatformModule.descrip: An advanced ranged platform module. With stabilizer and targeting system can give your pawn great accuracy and and greatly increase your pawn's' ranged combat ability.
LanguageData.MSE_AdvancedMeleePlatformModule.label: advanced melee platform module
LanguageData.MSE_AdvancedMeleePlatformModule.descript: An advanced melee platform module. With sensory motor and targeting system can give your pawn great melee damage and greatly improve your pawn's melee combat ability.
